section_home_landing_header_subtitle: One life-saving device at a time
section_home_trusted_brands_title: Trusted By World’s Most Favorite Brands
section_home_services_subtitle: We offer a wide array of trainings, services and products to suit your needs
section_home_services_training_summary: Hands-on sessions to master defibrillator usage.
section_home_services_maintenance_summar: Regular checks to ensure device reliability.
section_home_statistics_subtitle: Sudden Cardiac Arrest (SCA) strikes swiftly, claiming more lives than many cancers. Here's what you should know about SCA in Switzerland
section_home_statistics_info_one_subtitl: One person faces a life-threatening sudden cardiac arrest.
section_home_statistics_info_two_subtitl: Critical for survival. Without aid, irreversible brain damage can occur.
section_home_statistics_info_three_subti: Vital, but often not swift enough. Every minute delay decreases survival by 7-10%.
section_home_statistics_info_four_subtit: Using an Automated External Defibrillator within the first few minutes boosts survival rates up to 90%.
section_home_statistics_footer: Don't leave it to chance. Swiss Defibrillator offers a solution that can be the difference between life and death. Equip your space, be it home, office, or car. Invest in life. Invest in an AED.
section_products_philips_hs1_summary: Philips HS-1 Defibrillator: Portable, user-friendly, life-saving device. Designed for rapid response. Features clear voice prompts, intuitive operation. Ideal for emergencies. Reliable, trusted by professionals worldwide.
section_products_philips_frx_summary: The Philips HeartStart FRx defibrillator offers intuitive and clear step-by-step voice instructions, including CPR guidance, complemented by an audible metronome to aid basic life support (BLS) responders. Designed for versatility, it comes equipped with pre-connected SMART Pads II suitable for both adults and children, making it an essential tool for emergency response in cases of sudden cardiac arrest.
section_products_philips_hs1_electrodes_: Philips Heartstart HS-1 electrodes are designed for high-quality defibrillator performance, ensuring optimal functionality during critical moments. They are essential for the Philips HS-1's easy setup and clear voice-command guidance during sudden cardiac arrest situations.
section_products_philips_frx_electrodes_: The Philips FRx Electrodes are specially designed to work with the Philips FRx Defibrillator, offering reliable performance and compatibility. Essential for treating sudden cardiac arrests with the Philips FRx unit.
section_products_philips_hs1_frx_batteri: Philips HS-1 and FRx defibrillators utilize high-quality, non-rechargeable lithium batteries designed for long-term reliability. These batteries provide a minimum of 200 shocks or 4 hours of patient monitoring, with a shelf life of 5 years, ensuring that your defibrillator is always ready for emergency situations.
section_products_aivia_wall_cabinets_sum: AIVIA Wall Cabinets are designed for both indoor and outdoor storage of AEDs. Featuring a sturdy construction with a red ABS plastic chassis and a clear anti-UV polycarbonate cover, these cabinets ensure that any model AED is secure and readily accessible
section_products_aed_wall_mounts_summary: AED Wall Mounts provide a secure and visible storage solution for defibrillators. Compatible with a variety of units from leading brands, these mounts ensure that your AED is safely stored while being accessible for immediate use in emergencies.
section_products_philips_fast_response_k: The Philips Fast Response Kit contains essential tools and supplies for patient care and personal protection. This kit, attachable to a carry case, is a convenient addition to any Philips AED, equipping you with necessary items for emergency response.
section_products_wap_first_aid_kit_summa: The WAP First Aid Kit is a comprehensive collection of medical supplies, ideal for treating a variety of injuries such as pain, swelling, cuts, scrapes, and minor burns. This kit is perfect for emergency preparedness at home, in the office, or on the go.
section_products_philips_hs1_electrodes_: Philips HeartStart OnSite Infant/Child SMART Pads

The Philips HeartStart OnSite Infant/Child SMART Pads are specifically designed for use with the Philips OnSite defibrillator for children under 8 years or weighing less than 55 lbs. These pads instruct the defibrillator to reduce shock energy to a safer level for young patients, while also providing optional CPR coaching tailored for children. Featuring clear diagrams for correct placement, these pads are crucial for emergency response in schools, sports facilities, and public places
section_products_philips_frx_child_key_s: The Philips HeartStart FRx Infant/Child Key turns the FRx defibrillator into a pediatric defibrillator, lowering the shock energy to a level appropriate for children under 8 years old or weighing less than 55 lbs. This unique key is used when immediate care for a child in sudden cardiac arrest is needed, ensuring the FRx is ready for responders of all levels to save lives in schools and community settings.
section_products_aivia_100_summary: Designed for the rigors of outdoor use, the AIVIA 100 offers robust protection for AEDs. Featuring a polycarbonate cover and a night-time LED light, this cabinet ensures your AED is visible and accessible, while the ventilation system keeps it at optimal operating temperatures.
section_products_aivia_200_title: AIVIA 200 Indoor/Outdoor AED Cabinet with Heating
section_products_aivia_200_summary: The AIVIA 200 extends the features of the AIVIA 100 with added heating for extreme environments. Perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, it guarantees AED protection against cold, with visual alarms and LED lighting for high visibility and ease of access during emergencies.
section_products_aivia_200_power_supply_: The AIVIA Power Supply is a dependable solution to maintain electricity for heating and lighting. Compatible with all AIVIA models from 200 onwards, it provides continuous power, eliminating concerns during outages. Ideal for homes or businesses, it guarantees uninterrupted operation.
section_products_aivia_sticker_summary: A customizable wall mount sticker for AIVIA devices, offering space for logos, contact details, and emergency information. It’s made from durable materials to withstand environmental conditions and is easy to apply. Enhance your brand's visibility with this sleek and professional design.
section_products_philips_hs1_plexiglas_s: The Philips HS-1 Plexiglas Wall Mount provides a clear, sturdy housing for the Philips HS-1 defibrillator. This mount offers both visibility and accessibility, ensuring that the AED can be quickly located and retrieved in the event of an emergency.
section_products_wap_cabinet_summary: This universal wall-mounted AED cabinet fits a variety of defibrillator models, featuring a clear window for easy identification and quick access during emergencies. Its durable construction protects your AED from dust, debris, and tampering.
section_products_aed_sticker_summary: Ensure that your AED's location is clearly marked with this highly visible sticker. Designed for placement in key locations, it helps to quickly direct responders to the AED, significantly reducing response times in critical situations.
section_products_wall_sign_summary: This durable metal sign measures 23 x 17 cm and is designed for high visibility with two sides angled at 90°. It features four mounting holes and a green finish (RAL 6024), adhering to emergency color codes for safety. Weather-resistant, it's perfect for outdoor use, ensuring clear identification of AED locations.

meta_title_home: Swiss Defibrillator: Fight Cardiac Arrest with Advanced AED Solutions
meta_description_home: Discover Swiss Defibrillator’s comprehensive range of AEDs, training, and maintenance services to combat cardiac arrest effectively. Trusted by top brands, empowering lives across Switzerland.
meta_keywords_home: defibrillator, Switzerland, AED, cardiac arrest, emergency response, heart health, Swiss defibrillator provider
meta_title_defibrillators: Defibrillators for Life-Saving Solutions | Swiss Defibrillator
meta_description_defibrillators: Shop top-rated defibrillators, trusted by professionals and equipped with advanced technology. Find AEDs suitable for public and private spaces, with full product details and specifications.
meta_keywords_defibrillators: defibrillators, AEDs, life-saving devices, emergency equipment, cardiac arrest, heart safety, portable defibrillators
meta_description_accessories: Explore essential AED accessories, from replacement electrodes and batteries to protective wall cabinets. Ensure your defibrillator is ready for any emergency situation.
meta_keywords_accessories: AED accessories, defibrillator batteries, electrodes, AED wall cabinets, emergency equipment, Swiss defibrillator parts
meta_title_training: First Aid & AED Training Courses in Switzerland | Swiss Defibrillator
meta_description_training: Enroll in Swiss Defibrillator's first aid and AED training courses. Hands-on instruction for life-saving skills, including BLS and emergency response readiness.
meta_keywords_training: first aid training, AED courses, emergency response training, CPR, AED certification, Swiss first aid courses
meta_title_maintenance: AED Maintenance Plans for Swiss Businesses | Swiss Defibrillator
meta_description_maintenance: Ensure your defibrillator is always ready with our maintenance plans. Regular checks and replacement parts included, delivered by certified Swiss technicians.
meta_keywords_maintenance: AED maintenance, defibrillator servicing, emergency equipment maintenance, AED support, Swiss AED maintenance plans
meta_title_contact: Contact Swiss Defibrillator | AED Sales, Training & Support
meta_description_contact: Reach out to Swiss Defibrillator for training sessions, product quotes, or AED support. We're here to assist with personalized service and quick response.
meta_keywords_contact: contact Swiss Defibrillator, AED support, AED training inquiries, emergency equipment quotes, Swiss AED services
